metadata.title: CVE-2018-17883 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.0.x before6.0.12. An attacker could send an e-mail message with a malicious link toan OTRS system or an agent. If a logged-in agent opens this link, it couldcause the execution of JavaScript in the context of OTRS.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
